description: The LIBPKG file type is a native project format only associated with Altium Designer. To create a LIBPKG file, select File → New → Project → Integrated Library then select File → Save Project As .

Altium Designer users typically compile LIBPKG files to integrated libraries (INTLIB files) in order to store all the component information for a design in one portable and secure file. To compile a LIBPKG file to an INTLIB file, select Project → Compile Integrated Library or right-click the LIBPKG file and select Compile Integrated Library .
